profile.name: Cristina
profile.title: R&D Specialist turned into Tech
profile.description:
If you are seeking someone driven by a passion for problem-solving and a curiosity for tackling new challenges, I would be thrilled to join your team. With a background in developing R&D projects, I have refined my analytical thinking, creativity, and effective communication skills, which I now bring to the realm of technology. A natural aptitude for organizing and a keen interest in leveraging technology to optimize systems drove me to make a pivotal decision in my career—to leave my previous job and pursue software development studies. Through this journey, I aimed to discover and improve my role in team management within technological environments.

I am now enthusiastic about blending my technical expertise with my managerial skills in a full-time hybrid or remote position with an international focus. I am eager to make a positive impact through my work.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJgTwKgJcpQg0RaSKMYcHeNsQ)

challenges.description:
Researched natural compounds for eco-friendly extraction, maximizing yields and enabling new business opportunities.
Reviewed and optimized lab control, designing and implementing an Excel system for precise planning and scaling.
Managed lab teams and projects, streamlining methodologies to reduce stages and increase survival rates by 35%.
Collaborating on boosting a new commercial strategy of timber products, successfully opening new markets,.

Advised on Cooperation and Energy/Environment issues, resulting in informed decision-making and sustainable policies.
Crafted technical texts for parliamentary initiatives, facilitating clear communication and effective legislative action.
Coordinated civil society communication, fostering collaboration and community engagement in key initiatives.

Opened a new market in the USA that remains operational to this day, enabling international presence.
Coordinated the establishment of a new office and logistics from abroad, ensuring operations and market expansion.
Achieved significant revenue growth from the first year by effectively acquiring large international accounts.

Managed a multilingual team of 5 persons, facilitating effective communication, individual participant tracking, resource management, and prioritizing group and team safety. 
Contributed to non-formal education program planning, ensuring its effective execution.
Collaborated in the research, design, and development of new natural origin pesticides, fostering the development of new product lines.

Assisted as a Ph.D. assistant in advancing research efforts in the synthesis and analysis of bioactive anticancer molecules, potentially contributing to the development of new treatments or therapies.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
My ideal job is one that aligns with my passion for problem-solving and curiosity-driven approach to seeking new challenges and learning, while also allowing me to create a positive impact on people's lives and the environment. 

In my work environment, I highly value trust, flexibility, and the clear establishment of roles and objectives, alongside the adoption of agile methodologies that prioritize human values for optimal performance and results. An ideal work day for me would involve a blend of technical and managerial roles, fostering teamwork and effective communication to create an environment where each person can contribute their best. 

I see myself as someone who enjoys both individual contribution and responsibility for others, preferring a mix of technical and managerial roles that allow me to make a human and/or environmental impact through my work.
